articles.author: Charles Creitz
articles.title: Hannity rips Biden on Afghanistan: Americans being 'held hostage ... behind enemy lines' - Fox News
articles.description: President Biden has failed America – and the American people cannot and will not forget that, as untold hundreds of American citizens remain stranded in Taliban-controlled Afghanistan, Sean Hannity declared Friday in his "Opening Monologue."

articles.title: U.S. COVID-19 booster shot plan faces complications, some may miss Sept. 20 - CP24 Toronto's Breaking News
